API¶

Utils¶

bidict(*args, **kwargs)

Bidirectional dictionary inherited from the built-in dict to represent the class combination mapping.

compute_y_dist(y)

Compute the distribution of labels

compute_hamming_distance(v1, v2)

Compute the Hamming distance between two binary strings or binary vector

Metrics¶

adjusted_accuracy_score(y_true, y_pred, mapping)

Adjusted accuracy is an adjustment for accuracy.

itca(y_true, y_pred, mapping[, y_dist])

Sample-level information-theoretic classification accuracy (s-ITCA)

prediction_entropy(y_true, y_pred, mapping)

Compute the entropy of H(mapping(y_true), y_pred).

Search¶

GreedySearch([class_type, metric])

Search mapping with largest ITCA by greedy algorithm.

GreedySearchPruned([class_type, metric])

Greedy search using the lower bound derived by class-wise accuracy to prune search space.

BFSearch([class_type, metric])

BFSearchPruned([class_type, metric])
